title: [Rone Academy, A Large Rock]
description: Soft moonlight filters down upon this large, round rock set amidst the stream.  The rock itself is still warm from the afternoon sun, providing a comfortable and relaxing spot to dry off and watch the waters flow.
Bright sunlight streams down onto this large, round rock set amidst the stream.  The rock itself is warm, providing a comfortable and relaxing spot to dry off and watch the waters flow.
